full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BRTAN BZHUGS BDE LDAN ZHING MGON MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BKRA SHIS CHOS 'KHOR LHUN PO GLING GI SPRUL SKU PAndI TA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN 'JAM DPAL TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO'I BRTAN BZHUGS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES ZHI DAR TUR YAB HU HE BI AAM PAN T'A HO SHO CHING WANG DANG BKRA SHIS CHOS 'KHOR LHUN PO GLING GI MKHAN PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB TSOGS CHEN T'A BLA MA DGE BSKOS DANG DZA HI RAG CHI DZA LANG SOGS SER SKYA THUN MONG NAS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL BRTEN GSUM DANG KHA TAG BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^KHU RAL MKHAN PO YONGS 'DZIN NO MIN HAN LING ZHAN SHING THUNG AO HAN THU PAndI T'AR 'BOD PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DGON GSAR SKYES MING PA DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
